about_the_game:
A survival game with a classic style of the graphic adventures of the 80s.
Current graphics, updated to the new generations and with a simple way to play.
Two game modes, rescue and endless, make the right decisions and achieve your goal.
Solve the mystery of the story and help other players.
Discover your way and one great game.
Procedural game, it is generated as you progress. Every game is different.
All the decisions you make are very important to survive.
Get resources, search for targets and drop items on your way.
Survive the low temperatures, the enemies and the wildlife of the island.
Weather changes in real time.
How long will you be able to survive?

Game Modes :
- Rescue :
Survive as long as you can while you get resources and find your way off the island.
- Endless :
No limits. Get resources, drop items for help and survive as long as possible.

Version: 1.0

name: Time Re:Quest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8 or 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 1200 / Intel Core i5 3GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 1GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A survival game with a classic style of the graphic adventures of the 80s. Current graphics, updated to the new generations and with a simple way to play. Two game modes. Discover your way and one great game. Procedural game, it is generated as you progress. Every game is different. Survive!
